posts.author: Dingpot
posts.content: As I was merrily trundling though Mines of Twin Summits with Valerfor's excellent Dwarven Warmaster, it suddenly became apparent that this is such an old mod there are no Dwarven Waraxes. I think I can manage to restructure it to suit but the question is whether to have a warhammer and shield for the most part and use a greataxe for crit immunes or battle axe with shield and a heavy flail as the 2 hander option. Is it just personal choice or is there a game based reason why one might be better than the other?

posts.author: Stagmeister
posts.content:

I'm copying page 18 of the MTS thread (hopefully: if you end up with all of it, go to the aforementioned page), which should shed some light on your question.
